extracted-table.table-caption: Performance results of the base classifiers as well as the ensemble in AD-CT, AD-MCI, and MCI-CT classification tasks.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: All the listed classifiers were tested within a five-fold cross validation module.Feature selection was used for all the base classifiers as it improved their performance.The best results for each column were bolded.

table-wrap-foot.p: All the listed classifiers were tested within a five-fold cross validation module.
Feature selection was used for all the base classifiers as it improved their performance.
The best results for each column were bolded.
